feed.title: Alex Tokolyi
feed.subtitle: Hi! I’m a PhD student in Genomic Medicine at the University of Cambridge.

entry.title: First PhD rotation project in RNA splicing in sepsis

link.title: First PhD rotation project in RNA splicing in sepsis

entry.content:
Today I will be starting my first rotation project in the Davenport Lab at the Wellcome Sanger Institute. I’ll be looking at how RNA transcripts are differentially spliced between sepsis patients with different infections and responses. Hopefully, this will give some insight into the underlying regulation of this condition, with the aim of improving treatment.

Sepsis

Details

Splicing

Details
